title: Vaccines 2020: Vaccine Roundtable with the Experts, Part 1
cleaned_text:
By Ty & Charlene Bollinger | The Truth About Vaccines

Here is a star-studded roundtable discussion about vaccines, the COVID-19 epidemic's origin and response, and possible future vaccine(s). As most of us sit at home during these uncertain and scary times, this kind of discussion could not be more important, as the information shared herein is indispensable to our and out children's health and future. Knowledge is power. So, become more powerful by watching this today. And please spread this out among your social media and other friends, through whatever means you have. Thank you.

Robert O’Leary, JD BARA, has had an abiding interest in alternative health products & modalities since the early 1970’s & he has seen how they have made people go from lacking health to vibrant health. He became an attorney, singer-songwriter, martial artist & father along the way and brings that experience to his practice as a BioAcoustic Soundhealth Practitioner, under the tutelage of the award-winning founder of BioAcoustic Biology, Sharry Edwards, whose Institute of BioAcoustic Biology has now been serving clients for 30 years with a non-invasive & safe integrative modality that supports the body’s ability to self-heal using the power of the human voice. Robert brings this modality to serve clients in Greater Springfield, Massachusetts and New England (USA) & “virtually” the world. He can also be reached at romayasoundhealthandbeauty@gmail.
